      Returns:
      true if movement follows context

    • conditionMovement

      private Boolean conditionMovement(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode key, boolean can) throws InterruptedException
      Compares a movement that shouldn't or shouldn't happen against reality.
      Parameters:
      key - Key to press
      can - Whether it should be able to move to that key
      Returns:
      True if the expected outcome (can) actually happened
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the Thread couldn't sleep

      Tests expected settings.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If thread couldn't sleep

    • keyPressed

      @Test void keyPressed() throws InterruptedException
      Integration test on snake movement. Exhaustively tests all plausible key inputs, resulting in it moving in a circle.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If thread couldn't sleep

    • foodTest
